kpi.name: M8001C340

kpi_info.title: Number of transmissions with bundle size 2 NACK on PDSCH using MCS8
kpi_info.use: The number of negative acknowledged transmissions with bundle size 2 using MCS8 on PDSCH. Only TBs with bundle NACK should be counted. UPDATED: The counter is updated in each TTI scheduling period when bundle NACK received on PDSCH using bundle size 2 from MCS8.

kpi.kpi_alias: Number of transmissions with bundle size 2 NACK on PDSCH using MCS8
